rules_text: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only one target or activates an ability that targets only one target, copy that spell or ability for each other target it could target. Each copy targets a different one of those targets. [i](A spell or ability can’t target itself.)[/i]
notes: fluffy: reversed order of spell and ability, (added another with only one target to reduce ambiguity), that spell—>it (redundant)
